name: Rage Game HD V2.2
description:
This is a remaster of my first game the RageGame V3. The Rage Game HD or Remastered is a 3D version of the oringal Rage Game.

ATM the game has all the features of the oringal Rage Game but in 3D, we plan on bring many more gamemodes and features in the future.

Oh, an for those that have never played don't touch the walls!

Controls - 
Movement : W A S D
Sprint: Shift

Developed by AveragePiglet & Atroxit

WARNING: A Small percentage of people may experience seizues when exposed to certain lights, patterens or images, even with no history of epilepsy or seizures.
